def max_chain_length(pairs, n):
    # Sort the pairs based on the second element of each pair
    pairs.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])

    # Initialize the end of the current chain and the length of the chain
    current_end = -1
    chain_length = 0

    # Iterate through the sorted pairs
    for pair in pairs:
        if pair[0] > current_end:
            # If the current pair can be added to the chain
            current_end = pair[1]
            chain_length += 1

    return chain_length
